item.title: What is Hydroinformatics? Bridging Water Science and Technology
item.description: This article delves into the multifaceted world of hydroinformatics, exploring its history, applications, job market, and future prospects.

item.title: Hydroinformatics Engineer Roadmap
item.description: This roadmap outlines the essential study topics and skills needed to work as a hydroinformatics engineer.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Hello there! Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to chat about the fascinating world of hydroinformatics, I’m all ears. Reach Me Here Feel free to drop me a message using any of the contact methods below. I promise to get back to you as soon as I can. item.title: My Projects
item.description: Welcome to my projects page! Here you’ll find different projects I’ve worked on. They mix my love for water science, computer programming, and free software. HydroHamed A Hub for Hydroinformatics Enthusiasts HydroHamed is my online space for sharing knowledge about water science and technology. It’s for engineers, researchers, scientists, and anyone interested in this field. You can find helpful information, guides, and discussions here. ðŸ”— Explore HydroHamed Flood Events Database A Citizen Science Project for Gathering Flood Events Data

item.title: My Story
item.description: Water has always been a big part of my life, but it was computer programming that truly set me on my path. I’m Hamed Samsami, a Hydroinformatics Engineer from Iran, now living in beautiful Norway. My story is all about merging two passions: water and technology. How It All Started As a teenager, I spent countless late nights at my computer. While my friends were playing video games and chatting on Yahoo, I was learning to write code.
